Three times. Three. And then nothing. I just sat there.
I'm so, so sorry about that. Really. Let me—I think I can probably help fix whatever the original issue was? What were you calling about?

Interesting? Is that—what does that—never mind.
No no, it's good! Well, sort of. I mean—I can see the problem now. Transaction TRX-7765-MN keeps duplicating. System glitch maybe?
So you can fix it? Actually fix it? Not just... disconnect?
Absolutely. Yes. I'm applying credit code CRD-9901-LP right now. Should cover... wow. Four months of overcharges. I'm really sorry.

I know. I get it. Really. But that priority code? It routes straight to senior reps. No more drops. I promise.
That's... actually helpful. Thank you. Really. I'm just hoping this sticks.
It will. Confirmation CON-5547-RZ is in your email now. And hey—I'm genuinely sorry about yesterday. That wasn't okay.
